overview.title: Overview
overview.description: This tool extracts only the lines that were actually modified from the differences that occur between two branches in a specified Git repository, combines them with file names in a format with diff symbols like + and -, and outputs them as a file combined with pre-prepared coding rules, making it possible to pass them directly to conversational generative AI for review requests.

features.title: Main Features
items: Extract only actually modified lines from differences between two branches
Output coding rules combined with differences as files
Automatic detection of spelling errors, type mismatches, and coding rule violations is possible
Efficient AI review and rule checking
Can utilize conversational AI even in environments where IDE-integrated AI cannot be used

supplement.title: Supplementary Information
items: This tool can utilize conversational generative AI like ChatGPT even in workplaces where IDE-integrated AI like GitHub Copilot and Cursor cannot be used.
By passing files that combine differences and coding rules to AI, you can efficiently confirm modifications and check rules.
